name: AwesomeGerman
0:
”Alexa, open awesome german”
”Alexa, help me improving my german”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: awesome german
des:
AwesomeGerman is a fun an effective way to learn German. 
How it works:
- The skill will show you 5 words matching your current knowledge level. 
The words are carefully organised from levels from A1.1 to C1.2.

Disclaimer: The skill content is in both English and German.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
